Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+11 vs. AC

Hit: 2d6 + 8 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10 (one creature)

+11 vs. AC

Hit: 2d4 + 8 damage.

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Effect: Braxis makes two basic attacks.

At-Will ✦ illusion, polymorph

Standard

Effect: Melee 1 (one Medium creature); Braxis takes on the form of the target and alters his clothing and gear to match those of the target. Until the end of Braxis's next turn, the target is immobilized and takes 4d6 extra damage the first time Braxis hits the target with an attack. See also replica switch.

At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Braxis alters his physical form to appear as a Medium humanoid until he uses change shape again or until he drops to 0 hit points. To assume a specific individual's form, Braxis must have seen that individual. Other creatures can make a DC 28 Insight check to discern that the form is a disguise.

At-Will (1/round) ✦ fear) At-Will (1/round

Minor

Attack: Close burst 1 (one enemy in the burst)

+8 vs. Will

Hit: Braxis pushes the target up to 2 squares.

items.name: Wrath of the Sea Prince's Crown

description.value:
Encounter ✦ charm

Triggered

Trigger: Braxis is first bloodied.

Effect: Close burst 5 (one or two allies in the burst). The target shifts up to 3 squares and makes a basic attack.

At-Will

Triggered

Requirement: Braxis must be adjacent to an enemy affected by his perfect replica power.

Trigger: A melee or ranged attack from an enemy unaffected by Braxis's perfect replica targets Braxis.

Effect (Opportunity Action): Braxis and the enemy affected by his perfect replica power swap places, and the triggering attack then targets that enemy.
